settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage the preferences of the selected team, update its information, manage participants, and configure the simulator.
settings.teamInfoDesc: Modify the team's name, image, and description.
settings.membersDesc: Manage team members: invite or remove them.

simulator.mainDesc: Configure the behavior of the simulator engine.
simulator.title: Simulator Settings
simulator.description: Adjust the parameters and behaviors of the simulator according to the team's needs.

settings.initialCashDesc: Set the amount of money participants will start with in the simulator.
settings.currencyDesc: Select the currency used for all transactions within the simulator.
settings.marketVolatilityDesc: Determine the frequency and magnitude of changes in asset prices.
settings.marketLiquidityDesc: Control how easy it is to buy or sell assets without significantly affecting their prices.
settings.thickSpeedDesc: Adjust how quickly changes and events are processed within the simulated market.
settings.transactionFeeDesc: Set the cost of each operation performed by participants.
settings.eventFrequencyDesc: Determine the quantity and regularity of unexpected events affecting the market.
settings.dividendImpactDesc: Define how dividends affect asset prices within the simulator.
settings.crashImpactDesc: Configure the severity of sudden and sharp market crashes.
settings.allowShortSellingDesc: Enable or disable the ability to sell assets that participants do not own.

members.title: Participants Settings
members.description: Manage team members: invite new participants or remove existing ones.
members.adminSectionDesc: The professor or leader responsible for this team.
members.classmatesSectionDesc: List of other students in this team.
members.studentsListDesc: Manage access for currently enrolled students.
